questions.df48fd76-eb54-4d9c-b637-c24e022a9261: Eyal, I see that you prefer an apple. Could you share more about why you chose an apple? Are there specific qualities you enjoy about apples? Also, if others in the group suggest different fruits, how open are you to considering other options that might have similar benefits or appeal?
